verbose_text: Meanwhile the VEGF siRNA was carried by the nanovectors and transfected into cancer cells to downregulate VEGF mRNA and protein expressions, offering extraordinary therapeutic efficiency via synergistic PDT gene therapies XREF_BIBR.
